/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue with a few scattered clouds. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
